programme.title: The Twelve
programme.desc: A gripping courtroom drama that tells the story of 12 ordinary Australians who are selected for jury duty in a murder trial in which a woman stands accused of killing a child.

programme.title: The Twelve
programme.desc: Detective Sam Chedid takes the stand as various pieces of evidence are introduced to the court, some of which raise questions about Nathan Spears' involvement.

programme.title: The Twelve
programme.desc: The Crown calls Claire's best friend, Amita, to the stand. As the trial gets more complex, so too does the jury room dynamics, as their personal lives become increasingly entangled.

programme.title: The Twelve
programme.desc: Kate Lawson's provocative artwork takes centre stage in the courtroom. The Crown raises questions around her artistic methods, as well as revealing a complicated mental health diagnosis.

programme.title: The Twelve
programme.desc: Claire's father, Nathan Spears, takes the stand. He paints Kate as a sexual predator who groomed Claire, but reveals his temper when Colby gets under his skin.

programme.title: The Twelve
programme.desc: The jurors are taken to Kate's house to observe a demonstration of the Crown's case theory, before Kate's brother, Robbie, takes the stand.

programme.title: The Twelve
programme.desc: Claire's mother, Diane, takes the stand. In support of her sister, Kate, she throws suspicion onto Nathan as she further reveals the tumultuous relationship between him and Claire.

programme.title: The Twelve
programme.desc: When Claire's boarding school mistress, Fiona, takes the stand, a shock revelation changes the course of the trial. Jury room dynamics are tested as tensions reach boiling point.

programme.title: The Twelve
programme.desc: When Nathan lies under oath about the affair, an enraged Kate refuses Colby's advice not to testify, but will the secret between Kate and her sister explode under the pressure of the revelations?

programme.title: The Twelve
programme.desc: The jury is sequestered after the full story of Kate Lawson's connection to a historical crime is revealed; the jury's verdict is finally handed down after intense and emotional deliberations.

programme.desc: New York Times bestselling author, Pastor Jentezen Franklin, brings practical meaning to spiritual truths found in God's Word. Kingdom Connection is the teaching ministry of Free Chapel, a multi-campus church with a global ministry.

programme.title: David Jeremiah
programme.desc: Our prayers for others shouldn't just be for their physical needs. In Paul's prayer for the Colossian believers we find an example of how to pray for others to grow in their walk with the Lord.

programme.title: PowerPoint with Jack Graham
programme.desc: PowerPoint Ministries started as a vision of Dr Jack Graham 20 years ago with a vision to glorify God by introducing Jesus Christ as Lord to as many people as possible and to develop them in Christian living.

programme.title: Joyce Meyer: Enjoying Everyday Life
programme.desc: What kind of rejection have you faced? Join Joyce, Ginger, Erin & special guest Lysa TerKeurst for a discussion on hope, healing, and truth about your priceless worth in Christ.

programme.title: Hour of Power
programme.desc: Pastor Bobby Schuller provides spiritual principles and practices that can help people become happy students of Jesus and live a life of meaning believing there is no fuller, richer life than the one that is lived in Christ.

programme.title: Drive Thru History
programme.desc: Dave Stotts explores the amazing lives of the very first Christians. Using the Book of Acts as a roadmap, Dave travels the Mediterranean region to share the people, places and events that launched the faith.

programme.title: Jesus the Game Changer
programme.desc: Surprisingly, Jesus spoke more about money than nearly any other topic. Jesus challenged the prevailing wisdom of His day, and taught that all money was God's, to be used for Him instead of for personal advancement.

programme.title: Everyone: Amsterdam 23
programme.desc: This 3 day conference held in the Netherlands in 2023 was packed with many great speakers around the world. All with one heart and mission to reach EVERYONE worldwide with Christ.

programme.title: What's Cooking with Young & Free
programme.desc: Join Young & Free in the kitchen as they serve up a feast of music videos and a side of laughs.

programme.title: OK TV
programme.desc: Brendon and Cathie have poured their 30 years of experience with kids in schools and in ministry and the great goals of the local church into a energetic show that will engage the next generation.

programme.title: Connect
programme.desc: A school theatre group aspires to stage every book of the Bible. The kids have questions and an ever-expanding cast of surprising and often bizarre visitors is on hand to help them navigate their journey through the scriptures.

programme.title: TV One Life
programme.desc: Between the humour, music and unfiltered ministry, the message is clear, "God can change your life"! Fasten your seatbelts for this roller coaster ride of a show!

programme.title: Katherine Ruonala Ministries
programme.desc: God is inviting His people to rise up and boldly declare His promises.

programme.title: A Very Tall Man
programme.desc: Gary Hoogvliet, a very tall man, interviews interesting folk, not quite as tall as he, but nevertheless with fascinating and inspiring stories to tell.

programme.title: Be That
programme.desc: Connection is a living, breathing entity, and is the cornerstone of a healthy relationship. Hear first hand how a break down in a marriage can occur and the steps that can be taken to reach reconciliation.

programme.title: When Calls the Heart
programme.desc: Elizabeth and Nathan's date night leads to an undercover operation at a glamorous party. Lucas and Edie grow closer over cards. Rosemary holds auditions for a play.

programme.title: Behind the Sash
programme.desc: In this special episode we dig deeper into the four leading ladies adversities & follow their journey to visit Sydney golden girl Ally Pinnock.

programme.title: Welcome to Hope
programme.desc: John tries to act as though everything is normal, but Abe is looking for someone to blame for the Potter family misfortunes.

programme.title: Vindication
programme.desc: Caught in the crosshairs of a criminal investigation, Derek Taylor recalls the details of his failing marriage and whirlwind affair to a suspicious team of detectives.

programme.title: Billy Graham Classics
programme.sub-title: The Power of a Positive No
programme.desc: Gain the courage to say "No." 1 Cor. 10 (Birmingham, England 1984).

programme.title: New Creation Church
programme.sub-title: God_s Plan To Prosper You In The End Times Pt 1 of 4
programme.desc: Pastor Joseph Prince preaches dynamic messages centred on the pure gospel of grace. His desire is to help believers understand how greatly blessed and deeply loved.

programme.title: In Touch
programme.sub-title: Acquiring Wisdom/God's Condition for His Full Blessing
programme.desc: Tackling important life issues such as parenting, finances, personal crises, emotions, and relationships, Dr Stanley fervently believes the Bible to be the inerrant Word of God.

programme.desc: What kind of rejection have you faced? Join Joyce, Ginger, Erin & special guest Lysa TerKeurst for a discussion on hope, healing, and truth about your priceless worth in Christ.

programme.title: Despicable Me
programme.desc: In a happy neighbourhood with picket fences and rose bushes sits a black house with a dead lawn. In the cellar is a hideout where a dastardly villain is plotting a huge heist - he wants to steal the moon!

programme.title: Puss in Boots
programme.desc: After Puss in Boots was blamed for a bank robbery in San Ricardo, engineered against his wishes by Humpty Dumpty, Puss leaves Humpty to his fate. Now reunited, they try to trust each other again.

programme.title: Shaun the Sheep Movie
programme.desc: It's up to the most rascally sheep in England to bring the flock home when a caravan and a very steep hill lead them all to the big city.

programme.title: Madagascar
programme.desc: Four spoiled animals from the New York Central Zoo escape with the unintentional help of four fugitive penguins. They subsequently find themselves in Madagascar amidst happy lemurs.

programme.title: The Grinch
programme.desc: A cynical grump goes on a mission to steal Christmas, only to have his heart changed by a young girl's generous holiday spirit.

programme.title: Nanny McPhee
programme.desc: Move over, Mary Poppins. Nanny McPhee is a wonderfully hideous, mysterious nanny hired to tame seven brats with a feckless father.

programme.title: Sing
programme.desc: A dapper koala who has fallen on hard times has one final chance to restore his crumbling theatre by producing the world's greatest singing competition.

programme.title: The Secret Garden (2020)
programme.desc: When Mary's parents suddenly die, she's sent to live with her uncle on his remote country estate deep in the Yorkshire moors. While exploring, she discovers a hidden magical garden.

programme.title: Combat Wombat: Back 2 Back
programme.desc: An evil tech genius threatens to turn the city into a metaverse simulation, leaving the Combat Wombat to save the day.

programme.title: The Polar Express

programme.title: Hotel Transylvania

programme.title: Hotel Transylvania 2
programme.desc: Worried that his half-vampire grandson isn't showing signs of being a vampire, Dracula enlists his friends to put him through 'monster-in-training' boot camp.

programme.title: Matilda
programme.desc: A wonderful little girl who happens to be a genius, along with her understanding teacher, outwit the worst parents and the worst school principal imaginable.

programme.title: The Angry Birds Movie
programme.desc: When an island populated by happy, flightless birds is visited by mysterious outsiders, it is up to two unlikely outcasts, and birds with temper problems, to set things right.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda
programme.desc: Clumsy and overweight panda, Po, dreams of becoming a kung fu master.

programme.title: The Road to El Dorado

programme.title: Direct Talk
programme.desc: In 2020, Kitajima Masaaki published the world's first paper on how the spread of COVID-19 could be tracked by monitoring wastewater. He talks about making an impact on infectious disease control.

programme.title: One in Every Japanese
programme.desc: 1 in 2500 people started farming in 2022. As we talk to new farmers who've come from totally different industries, we examine the values they have found in this labor-intense yet rewarding field.

programme.title: Ramen Japan
programme.desc: Two local takes on ramen that kept Hiroshima fed during postwar reconstruction; flavors passed down for generations.

programme.title: Ukiyoe EDO-LIFE

programme.title: Today's Close-Up
programme.desc: Drug repositioning uncovers new uses for existing medicines, speeding development and lowering costs. AI boosts this by revealing hidden drug-disease links, offering hope for untreatable illnesses.

programme.title: Document 72 Hours
programme.desc: An electronics retail store in Yokohama, Japan, has six floors filled with home appliances. For three days in spring, we asked customers what they came to buy in this season of new beginnings.

programme.desc: At Kyoto University's CiRA, Kenji OSAFUNE is using iPS cells to find drug for hereditary kidney disease and has also created cells for kidney transplants. Take an in depth look at his challenges.

programme.title: Mosley
programme.desc: A species of creatures known as 'thoriphants' rebel against their life of servitude and embark on a treacherous journey to find the fabled city of Uprights.

programme.title: GGC Life TV
programme.desc: With a vision for a church that is relatable, enjoyable and uplifting, Glorious Gospel Church and their values are based firmly in the bible and their aim is to express the Good News of Jesus Christ.

programme.title: David Jeremiah
programme.desc: Our prayers for others shouldn't just be for their physical needs. In Paul's prayer for the Colossian believers we find an example of how to pray for others to grow in their walk with the Lord.

programme.title: The Catholic Guy
programme.desc: Bruce Downes is The Catholic Guy. No matter your age or background, be prepared to laugh, learn and listen to what God is trying to say to you. Wherever you are around the world today, God is never far from you.

programme.title: The Way of the Master
programme.desc: Reincarnation is a popular belief, but what does the bible say?

programme.title: Friends and Heroes
programme.desc: Friends and Heroes is an animated children's adventure based in Ancient Egypt, Israel and Rome. The story follows two young friends Macky and Portia as they fight for justice against the Roman Empire.

programme.title: Hillsong Kids: Cubbyhouse
programme.desc: An entertaining show for the little ones aged between 2 and 6, with songs, fun craft time, bible stories and animated teaching and illustrations.

programme.title: God Rocks! Playlist
programme.desc: Join kid-hosts Myles and Stella for a fun, non-stop musical playlist of hit songs about Faith and Trust!

programme.title: Hunter & Twerp Scripture Seekers
programme.desc: Welcome to the wonderful world of Brightington, home of Hunter and Twerp, Scripture Seekers! Stacks of fun Bible lessons for children to enjoy.

programme.title: Bible Man
programme.sub-title: Say Goodbye to the Grand Duchess of Greed Part 1
programme.desc: Miles Peterson had everything: Money, power, fame. Until he lost it. Then Miles finds the power of God and harnesses that power to become Bibleman.

programme.title: Sea Kids
programme.desc: The Sea Kids will help transform the heart and mind of every child as they learn how to tangibly live out biblical principles and build a strong foundation in Jesus.

programme.title: Whirl
programme.desc: A cartoon series about the loveable, enthusiastic kids of First Second Church. In each episode, the kids tackle a different theme that is central to Christian values. Everything from generosity and forgiveness to doubt.

programme.title: Lessons From The Bible
programme.desc: Join Pastor Doug, Dusty, Amelia and all the characters as they learn about the Bible and how it applies to daily life. Games, songs, and some silly puppets will inspire kids to follow along and get into God's Word!

programme.title: Deditos
programme.sub-title: God And His People In The Wilderness
programme.desc: This quirky kids show introduces children to classic stories from the Old Testament using finger puppets.

programme.title: The Blello Show
programme.desc: Join Kyle, Lyds, Extra Bear, and Stu as they share with you some cool vids, catchy catch phrases crazy challenges, things you can do in 3 minutes, and other random stuff to make your life awesome. It's the Blello Show! Let's go!

programme.title: Arise Kids TV
programme.desc: ARISE Kids TV is jam packed full of faith and fun delivered by your favourite friends! Arise Kids TV believes in the next generation aims to inspire, connect and empower kids to follow Jesus and love life.

programme.title: Ryan Defrates: Secret Agent
programme.desc: Ryan Defrates is a young spy with a whole lot to learn. One day he's paired with a very unlikely partner, his mum. She knows more about shopping than solving crime, but her wisdom and kindness somehow seem to save the day.

programme.title: Kids Beach Club
programme.desc: Join the Beach Club Kids as they navigate life, explore character lessons, and have a blast playing memorable games while discovering God through the pages of His Word, the Bible.

programme.title: Welcome to Hope
programme.desc: John gets his life back on track thanks to Jude and Pastor Luke, until an unthinkable family tragedy occurs.

programme.title: Be That
programme.desc: Infertility is an issue faced by many couples, and is an unpredictable journey often marked by stress, anxiety and heartache. However, hope hides in unexpected places and infertility need not be the end of the story.

programme.title: New Creation Church
programme.sub-title: Inherit God_s Promises By Faith, Not Works
programme.desc: Pastor Joseph Prince preaches messages centred on the pure gospel of the grace of God. His desire is to help believers understand grace and how deeply loved they are by their heavenly Father.

programme.title: Three Chairs
programme.desc: A talk show with a difference that celebrates the art of good conversation. Hosts grapple with topics including dating, phone addiction, parenting, and gender equality.

programme.title: Alaska Missionaries
programme.desc: Missionaries, doing real work, helping people in remote parts of Alaska. With breathtaking scenery, adventurous landscapes and down to earth personalities, this Alaskan show just might become your family favourite.

programme.title: Branching Out
programme.desc: To help build a family tree, single mom Amelia tracks down her daughter's biological father. It becomes a journey of trust, love, and discovering the meaning of family.

programme.title: Fly Away Home
programme.desc: The story of a 13-year-old girl who goes to live with her estranged, eccentric father following the death of her mother. She finds renewed happiness when she adopts an orphaned flock of baby geese.

programme.title: Hour of Power
programme.desc: Pastor Bobby Schuller provides spiritual principles and practices that can help people become happy students of Jesus and live a life of meaning believing there is no fuller, richer life than the one that is lived in Christ.

programme.title: Joel Osteen
programme.desc: Direct from Houston, Texas, join Joel and Victoria Osteen and the team from Lakewood Church, for a session of powerful music and empowering preaching.

programme.title: Give Me an Answer
programme.desc: Exploring answers to life's most difficult questions and recorded on college campus across the United States, Cliffe Knechtle engages with students and professors, to give real answers to questions about Christianity.

programme.title: Valentine in the Vineyard
programme.desc: Frankie & Nate have just gotten engaged when Frankie's cousin & Nate's brother tell them that they're getting married on Valentine's Day.

programme.title: For the Lost
programme.desc: For the Lost is a unique documentary feature that follows one of a kind missionary band 'No Longer Music' on their tour through much of Europe and the Middle east.

programme.title: Life with Paul De Jong
programme.desc: We like to call it 'soul food'. LIFE TV uses creative illustration, real life stories and biblical teaching to encourage and help viewers discover a greater purpose to their lives.

programme.title: David Jeremiah
programme.desc: Our prayers for others shouldn't just be for their physical needs. In Paul's prayer for the Colossian believers we find an example of how to pray for others to grow in their walk with the Lord.

programme.title: Planetshakers
programme.desc: Join Planetshakers for their church service in Melbourne. A fresh Word with praise and worship each week. Live empowered.

programme.title: A Very Tall Man
programme.desc: Gary Hoogvliet, a very tall man, interviews interesting folk, not quite as tall as he, but nevertheless with fascinating and inspiring stories to tell.

programme.title: Home is Where the Heart Is
programme.desc: Actor and craftsman Luke Macfarlane alongside designer Oliva Westbrooks bring heart, home, and hope to life-changing renovations - proving that sometimes, the greatest transformations begin from within.

programme.title: Home is Where the Heart Is
programme.desc: Actor and craftsman Luke Macfarlane alongside designer Oliva Westbrooks bring heart, home, and hope to life-changing renovations - proving that sometimes, the greatest transformations begin from within.

programme.title: Jumanji: The Next Level
programme.desc: As they return to Jumanji to rescue one of their own, nothing is as they expect. They will have to brave parts unknown and unexplored to escape the world's most dangerous game.

programme.title: The Croods
programme.desc: The story of the world's first family road trip. After their cave is destroyed, the Crood family must embark on a comedy adventure into strange and spectacular territory in search of a new home.

programme.title: Paddington
programme.desc: When a Peruvian bear travels to London in search of a home, he finds himself lost and alone at Paddington Station. This charming family comedy is based on the classic children's books.

programme.title: Monsters Vs Aliens
programme.desc: Follows the adventures of BOB, Link, Dr Cockroach, and Susan as they learn to adapt to a new world and work side-by-side.

programme.title: Nanny McPhee
programme.desc: Move over, Mary Poppins. Nanny McPhee is a wonderfully hideous, mysterious nanny hired to tame seven brats with a feckless father.

programme.title: Scoob!
programme.desc: With hundreds of cases solved and adventures shared, Scooby and the gang face their most challenging mystery ever: a plot to unleash the ghost dog Cerberus upon the world.

programme.title: Matilda
programme.desc: A wonderful little girl who happens to be a genius, along with her understanding teacher, outwit the worst parents and the worst school principal imaginable.

programme.title: Jurassic Park
programme.desc: An experiment with dinosaurs created from DNA becomes a disaster when sabotage sets the prehistoric monsters loose in an island theme park.

programme.title: The Lost World: Jurassic Park
programme.desc: It has been four years since the disaster at Jurassic Park and two groups are in a race against time that will determine the fate of the remote island's prehistoric inhabitants.

programme.title: Jurassic Park III
programme.desc: A small team embark on a dangerous task, searching through a deserted island inhabited by ferocious dinosaurs.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda 3
programme.desc: The plump black-and-white bear, Po, is back in his biggest adventure yet.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda 4
programme.desc: After three death-defying adventures, Po, the Dragon Warrior is called upon by destiny to become the spiritual leader of the Valley of Peace.

programme.title: Madagascar
programme.desc: Four spoiled animals from the New York Central Zoo escape with the unintentional help of four fugitive penguins. They subsequently find themselves in Madagascar amidst happy lemurs.

programme.title: The Boss Baby: Family Business
programme.desc: Boss Baby continues to navigate the cutthroat corporate jungle gym of Baby Corp, while angling to achieve the near-impossible: the work-life balance of a modern career baby.

programme.title: Hook
programme.desc: A lawyer who has lost any memory that he was once the legendary Peter Pan must travel to Neverland, aided by Tinker Bell, to rescue his children from his nemesis, Captain Hook.
